verses.text: \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w again|strong="H3254"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w certain|strong="H0259"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* Saraa, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* race \w of|strong="H0376"\w* Dan, \w whose|strong="H0376"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* Manue, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w barren|strong="H6135"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w an|strong="H7200"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: Thou art \w barren|strong="H6135"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* thou shalt \w conceive|strong="H2029"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w bear|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3205"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w therefore|strong="H6258"\w* \w beware|strong="H8104"\w* \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w no|strong="H0408"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w nor|strong="H0408"\w* \w strong|strong="H7941"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w thing|strong="H4994"\w*.

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt \w conceive|strong="H2029"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w bear|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* razor \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* touch \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* Nazarite \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* infancy, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* mother’s \w womb|strong="H0990"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w begin|strong="H2490"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w deliver|strong="H3467"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H0935"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w A|strong="H0935"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w having|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* countenance \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w an|strong="H0935"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w*, \w very|strong="H3966"\w* awful. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w who|strong="H0376"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* whence \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w by|strong="H0413"\w* \w what|strong="H2088"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w called|strong="H0559"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w would|strong="H0559"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w thus|strong="H1961"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w* thou shalt \w conceive|strong="H2029"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w bear|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*: \w beware|strong="H2009"\w* thou \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w no|strong="H0408"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, \w nor|strong="H0408"\w* \w strong|strong="H7941"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, \w nor|strong="H0408"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2932"\w* \w thing|strong="H3588"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w child|strong="H5288"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* Nazarite \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* infancy, \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* mother’s \w womb|strong="H0990"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0935"\w* Manue \w prayed|strong="H6279"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w beseech|strong="H4994"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H4994"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* mail \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* thou didst \w send|strong="H7971"\w*, \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* ought \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w concerning|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w child|strong="H5288"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w born|strong="H3205"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* Lord \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* prayer \w of|strong="H0376"\w* Manue, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* Lord \w appeared|strong="H0935"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*. \w But|strong="H0369"\w* Manue \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w*. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H8085"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* saw \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w*,

\w She|strong="H0834"\w* \w made|strong="H4116"\w* \w haste|strong="H4116"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w ran|strong="H7323"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* hath \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w before|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w rose|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w followed|strong="H0310"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w coming|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: Art thou \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*? \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* Manue \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0935"\w*: \w When|strong="H1961"\w* thy \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w shall|strong="H4100"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w pass|strong="H0935"\w*, \w what|strong="H4100"\w* wilt thou \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w child|strong="H5288"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w*? \w or|strong="H4639"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w shall|strong="H4100"\w* \w he|strong="H0935"\w* \w keep|strong="H0935"\w* himself?

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Manue: \w From|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w spoken|strong="H0559"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, let \w her|strong="H3605"\w* refrain herself:

\w And|strong="H0398"\w* \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* cometh \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w vine|strong="H1612"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w strong|strong="H7941"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2932"\w* \w thing|strong="H3605"\w*: \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w whatsoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w*, \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* fulfill \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w observe|strong="H8104"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Manue \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w beseech|strong="H4994"\w* thee \w to|strong="H0413"\w* consent \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w request|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w* dress \w a|strong="H3068"\w* kid \w for|strong="H0413"\w* thee.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w If|strong="H0518"\w* thou press \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thou wilt \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* holocaust, \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* Manue \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w What|strong="H1697"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w*, \w if|strong="H3588"\w* thy \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w pass|strong="H0935"\w*, \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* honour thee?

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H1931"\w*: \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* askest thou \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w wonderful|strong="H6383"\w*?

\w Then|strong="H3947"\w* Manue \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* kid \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* flocks, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* libations, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H5927"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w rock|strong="H6697"\w*, \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* doth \w wonderful|strong="H6381"\w* \w things|strong="H6381"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w flame|strong="H3851"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* towards \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w ascended|strong="H5927"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w flame|strong="H3851"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* Manue \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w*, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w flat|strong="H5307"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* forthwith Manue \w understood|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H7200"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*,

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*: \w We|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0802"\w* \w certainly|strong="H3588"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H7200"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*: \w If|strong="H3863"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w mind|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* \w us|strong="H7200"\w*, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w received|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* holocaust \w and|strong="H3068"\w* libations \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* shewed \w us|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w told|strong="H0559"\w* \w us|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* come.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w she|strong="H7121"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3205"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w child|strong="H5288"\w* \w grew|strong="H1431"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w began|strong="H2490"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*, \w between|strong="H0996"\w* Saraa \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Esthaol.
